title: Having issues Recording/Streaming since Riot added the in-game record feature.
body:
It gets incredibly framey (seems to lock itself at around 30 FPS). Not sure if it's just a dodgey interaction with OBS or what. Never had issues before this (could play at 4K max settings and downsample the stream to 1080p30FPS with no issues).

https://www.mediafire.com/file/ena9e3fnngr6f0l/DxDiag.txt (I swear I used to be able to just attach files to posts?)

replies.body: Hmmmm I'm not super familiar with OBS myself, as I've always used a different streaming software, but it sounds like the FPS issues are happening due to that extra software running in the background. Let me know if you're having these issues with only League running, otherwise, OBS might just be what's lowering your frames.

I did a clean install of LoL and OBS and it seems to be fine now. Still not a single clue what the problem was. Thinking maybe my OBS setting were dodgy/overly ambitious and when I set it up after the clean install I corrected any issues.

I don't stream _that_ often, but OBS is pretty handy for taking good quality clips so I like the recording function.
